results.title: Exenatide Effects on Cardiometabolic Risk and Weight in Adolescents with Morbid Obesity and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus: Two Case Reports
results.text_hl: Two @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Obesity_Morbid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009767 @@@morbid obesity@@@ who failed conventional therapy with @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ glargine and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ were treated with the addition of @CHEMICAL_Exenatide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077270 @@@Exenatide@@@.

citations.NLM: Censani M, Chin VL, Fennoy I. Exenatide Effects on Cardiometabolic Risk and Weight in Adolescents with Morbid Obesity and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus: Two Case Reports J Obes Weight Loss Medicat. 2015;1(1):. PMID: 27182560
